issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
In 3.3 we removed the "Instance Running Times Section" from instance reports. This table was not removed from bodega so reports generated at a data warehouse contain this table. It should be removed from bodega as well.

Steps:
# setup data warehouse
# exports some data from eucalyptus
# import the data into data warehouse
# generate instance report

{code}
[ec2-user@euca-172-31-163-155 ~]$ elinks --dump report.html
                                Instance Report

    Begin:Tue Aug 20 00:00:00 EDT 2013

    End:Thu Aug 22 00:00:00 EDT 2013

  Resource Usage Section

                                                      Net Total   Net                   Disk IOPS  Disk Time
                                                         KB     External    Disk KB        (M)       (secs)
                                                                   KB
                 InstanceId   Type   # mins CpuUsage%  In   Out In  Out   Read   Write  Read Write Read Write
Zone: PARTI01      cumul.    cumul.  2 269     0.7    16164 57  52   36  592968  100937 0.1   0.0   0     0
  Account:         cumul.    cumul.  2 269     0.7    16164 57  52   36  592968  100937 0.1   0.0   0     0
  test-account-0

        admin

Zone: PARTI00      cumul.    cumul.  7 500     0.7    30495 275 59   58  1449701 212737 0.2   0.0   0     0
  Account:         cumul.    cumul.  3 249     0.7    14774 53  25   24  800386  101446 0.1   0.0   0     0
  test-account-0

        admin

                 i-03393F87 t1.micro 1  1      0.0      -    -   1   0      -      -     -     -    -     -
                 i-1AED42C5 t1.micro 1 239     0.4    14382 42  20   20  316207  54109  0.1   0.0   0     0

        admin

fields.summary: Data Warehouse reports still have instance running times section
